Public Types

enum  StandardTerrainEffects {
  Flatten = 0, Raise = 1, Lower = 2, Smooth = 3,
  Noise = 4, Revert = 5, Erode = 255, Weather = 254,
  Olsen = 253, Paint = 252
}
 

A standard set of terrain brushes and effects recognised by viewers.

Vector3  pos,
byte  size,
byte  action,
UUID  agentId 
)

Modify Land.

Parameters:
pos Land-position (X,Y,0)
size The size of the brush (0=small, 1=medium, 2=large)
action 0=LAND_LEVEL, 1=LAND_RAISE, 2=LAND_LOWER, 3=LAND_SMOOTH, 4=LAND_NOISE, 5=LAND_REVERT
agentId UUID of script-owner

void Aurora.Modules.Terrain.TerrainModule.TaintTerrain (  ) 

Taint the terrain. This will lead to sending the terrain data to the clients again. Use this if you change terrain data outside of the terrain module (e.g. in osTerrainSetHeight).

Implements OpenSim.Region.Framework.Interfaces.ITerrainModule.
